title: Teams class returning 64 NHL teams instead of 32 & Schedule class returning last 2 games in the season rather than games already played
body:
**Describe the bug**
When calling a loop to gather all teams, the Teams library is returning 64 teams instead of 32. Also, when looping through the Schedule class for each team, it's only returning data from April (last 2 games). I have been using this repository for the past year for baseball, football, and hockey and have never encountered this issue.


```
from sportsipy.nhl.teams import Teams
from sportsipy.nhl.schedule import Schedule
from tqdm import tqdm

DF = []
for team in tqdm(Teams('2022')):
    schedule = team.schedule
    for game in schedule:
        DF.append(
            {
              'index': game.boxscore_index,
              'team': team.abbreviation  
            }
        )

DF = pd.DataFrame(DF)

``````

**Expected behavior**
should only be returning 32 teams worth of data and the game level data should be from all games this year up through yesterday.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Windows 10
 - Sportsipy Version: [e.g. 0.6.0 or commit hash if using code]
